paper_abstract: Given a graph G and a non-negative integer g, the g-extraconnectivity of G is the minimum cardinality of a set of vertices in G, if such a set exists, whose deletion disconnects G and leaves every remaining component with more than g vertices. This study shows that the 2-extraconnectivity of a k-ary n-cube Q(n)(k) for k >= 4 and n >= 5 is equal to 6n - 5. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
